sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,u.`name`,w.openid,DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y年%c月') as YM,DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%c') as M ,a.cnt,dev.dev_cnt,ins.in_cnt from ( SELECT user_id FROM b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log where DATE_FORMAT(login_time,'%Y%c')=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y%c') group by user_id ) l inner join b2b_user.uuc_user u on l.user_id=u.user_id and u.user_biz_type=1 INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user_identity i on u.user_id=i.user_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT wxa.userid,wxa.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa INNER join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid WHERE zqu.appid=@appId ) w on u.user_id=w.userid CROSS JOIN ( select count(1) as cnt from ( select uid From b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a where DATE_FORMAT(created_time,'%Y%c') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y%c') union all select item_id from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item a where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y%c') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y%c') )a ) a cross join ( select count(1) as dev_cnt From b2b_company.uuc_developer where state=2 ) dev cross JOIN ( select count(DISTINCT supplier_id) as in_cnt From b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register where storage=1 ) as ins
